subtitle: Other combinations of fruits and fruit juice could be used in this recipe.

method.text: Whizz the peaches and their juice in a food processor or blender until smooth. Add the pineapple juice. Blend briefly to combine.
Pour into lolly moulds and freeze until solid.
To serve, dip the ends briefly into hot water to unmould.

title: Icicle peach and pineapple lollies
